title: [LFM] Looking for Mid + Top [Gold +]
body:
Hello summoners, 

We currently are looking for 2 people to fill in the roles for mid and top and also 1 or 2 subs. We are looking to compete in some online oceanic tournaments so we want people that: 
-	Don’t flame/blame teammates 
-	Atleast Gold +
-	Are able to use skype or curse voice etc.
-	Are reliable with commitments
On that note we will be playing 8 – 9 (NZ Time) on weekdays and we can negotiate times on weekends.  (If your from Australia please  convert the time to see what the time is for you at 8 NZ time. )

Additional Notes: 

-	Also we would preferably want either the mid or top to be comfortable to shot call.
-	The three of us are ranging from 15 – 16 so if you are not comfortable with our ages then don’t join. 

If you are interested in joining the team, add me: Raf and follow this template: 

Summ Name:
Division:
Role: 
Champ Pool:

replies.body:
Sumn Name: OGEKTHEKNIGHT
Division: Plat 4
Role: anywhere but least fav role is jungle
Champ Pool: xerath orianna lulu rumble azir vel'koz pantheon irelia and alot more

Can play any role, played in a lot of teams so know how 5's work ign Wolves 
from NZ

Summ Name: DAISKi
Division: GOLD 4 last season
Role: MID 
Champ Pool: Any mid champ depending on team comp & enemy team comp
